body:
Allow users to specify whatever `before_script` and `after_script` they want in their `spack.yaml`, on a per-runner basis.  Users can also specify their own `script`, but if they don't, we'll generate the standard `spack ci rebuild` script for them.

For a more in-depth discussion of this proposed change, see #17164, or take a look at the test and documentation added by this change.
title: Support for user-defined scripts to customize pipeline jobs
